clues.text: Off on another adventure, this boy is paired with "The Great Glass Elevator" in a Roald Dahl tale

Gorham's top-selling silver pattern or the lace that made the Big Bopper's "world go round"

rounds.text: The name of this benefactor of man signifies "forethought"
